meanings.definition: To give permission for something to happen or be done.
meanings.sent1: Mom allows me to stay up late on weekends.
meanings.sent2: The sign allows parking for only two hours.
meanings.sent3: Dad allows the dog to sleep on the bed, but not the cat.
meanings.sent4: The key allows access to the secret garden of wonders.
meanings.sent5: The magic wand allows wishes to come true instantly.

meanings.definition: To make it possible for something to happen or exist.
meanings.sent1: Good soil allows plants to grow strong and healthy.
meanings.sent2: The new bridge allows cars to cross the river more easily.
meanings.sent3: The invention of the wheel allows us to travel faster than ever before.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight allows the flowers to bloom beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent5: A positive attitude allows for success in any endeavor.
